SELECT_AUTHORIZATION_VW: select AuthOrderId, AuthProfileId, DateAuthorizationExpires, DateCreated, message, active from chaseauthorizationvw where OrderNumber = @OrderNumber
SELECT_CREDIT_CARD_PAYMENT_VW: select Status, CapturedAmount, SettledAmount, vw.* from creditcardpaymentvw vw where OrderNumber = @OrderNumber
SELECT_CONSUMER_ORDER_STATUS: select Status from consumerorder where OrderNumber = @OrderNumber
